resources.string: {SynTech-X ’17 – ‘18}, the Annual Curriculum Intense Intercollegiate Computer Science Festival of R.D. and S.H. National College, is a pool of technical events for all those who are more than just passionate about the ever emerging computer technology. It provides a platform to students to showcase their talents, technical skills and explore the practical dimensions of education imparted through the curriculum.

The main aim of this festival is to understand and strengthen the technical concepts taught in the class .These are then applied through a number of activities, perfectly blended with entertainment and technology. Another objective of the festival is to promote talent by developing e-skills and to provide innovation in the emerging areas of technology. {SynTech-X}, a mixture of traditional ideology and modern technologies, provides an opportunity to the passionate minds to inculcate skills of calculated risk and also of learning to think on one’s feet.

The festival offers a plethora of events in which the participants can exhibit their skills in brain storming events – like SynTechXist (the Computer Science Quiz), D–Code, Minute to Code it, Code in the Dark, as well as artistic events like Affiche (Poster-Designing) and Rete Designo (Web Designing), Lab Crap (Best Out of Waste). Popular events like Ad-Mad and Power-Point Presentation Competition and ‘Fun-tastic’ events like Swift Keys and Syoogle (e-Treasure Hunt), LAN Gaming, the most popular event, draws students from all fields to our festival.

Perpetuating the tradition, the department will be inviting two prominent personalities; one from the academic field, and one from the industry. They will enlighten the participants on the theme: “Cyber Safety” during the inaugural session. We also propose to organize an Alumni Meet of the Computer Science students on 20th January, 2018.
